subject: Sports Injuries
Hockey, Ice
Knees
lead_paragraph: Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma said Evgeni Malkin, a former N.H.L. scoring champion, might need surgery for torn knee ligaments after Friday’s injury in a win at Buffalo.
snippet: Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma said Evgeni Malkin, a former N.H.L. scoring champion, might need surgery for torn knee ligaments after Friday’s injury in a win at Buffalo.
